title: Professional Experience
subtitle: My journey as a developer over the past 5+ years

timeline.title: Lead Full-Stack Developer

Architect and implement modern frontend solutions using React and Vue
Design and optimize backend systems with Node.js and PHP

timeline.title: Full-Stack Web Developer

timeline.title: Junior Web Developer
